author: Nicole Acevedo
title: Broadway actor Nick Cordero to have leg amputated after COVID-19 complications
description: Broadway actor Nick Cordero will have his right leg amputated as a result of coronavirus-related complications, his wife Amanda Kloots said on her Instagram.
content:
Nick Cordero attends the 2017 Drama Desk Nominees Reception at Marriott Marquis Times Square on May 10, 2017 in New York City.Noam Galai / WireImage file
